name: Girls vs. Suits
writer: Carter Bays (created by), Craig Thomas (created by), Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Robia Rashid (executive story editor), Matt Kuhn (story editor)
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris
plot: Barney chooses between wearing suits and sleeping with a sexy bartender. Meanwhile, Ted gets ever closer to meeting "the mother".
